title: Mystery as piano shows up on clifftop boasting stunning views of Sydney harbour
text:
Sydneysiders were left in awe after finding an abandoned piano atop a cliff over looking the harbour.

A photo was shared to the Mosman Living Facebook page, showing the deserted piano on the edge of a cliff at Middle Head on the north shore.

Despite no one knowing where it came from, the acoustic instrument was welcomed by musical fanatics who took the opportunity to show off their talent.

Videos uploaded also showed gifted individuals perform on the piano as boats sailed in the distance.

Videos uploaded also showed gifted individuals perform on the piano as boats sailed away in the distance

A photo was shared to the Mosman Living Facebook page of the deserted piano on the edge of a cliff with a gorgeous backdrop of the harbour

Social media users commented at the impressive scenery.

'This is just amazing!!! What a perfect match for such a dramatic spot, so surreal!!! This is art!' one person wrote.

‘Love it! Wish I could have been there to see – ‘a la natural music by the sea!’ another wrote.

'Wow. This is the second time I’ve seen a post of the abandoned piano in middle harbour,' someone else commented.

'It would be an awesome spot to just sit and play!' another commented.
description: The acoustic musical instrument was welcomed by visitors to Middle Head in Sydney, who showed off their musical talent.
authors: Sahar Mourad For Daily Mail Australia
